item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:28, topic:209563”][quote author=Stork link=topic=276035.msg2253112#msg2253112 date=1212272418]
Depression is for pussies.

Shut the fuck up and squat.
[/quote]

You could be depressed everyday from certain points and be in denial that your are.[/quote]
I was depressed, that’s why I started working out. Now I’ve never felt better. I would recommend it to anyone who’s feeling down. It’s hard to hate yourself when your setting new personal records every week

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @Slayer_Dungeon Slayer Dungeon
item.description:
@Slayer_Dungeon wrote:

Can you guys please stop arguing like little kids. If you have nothing good to say don’t say anything at all. If everyone lived by that rule it would make things soo much easier. We have enough struggles in life and when we come to mopar to have some fun and enjoyment away from the crap it would be nice not to have the same crap here.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @Slayer_Dungeon Slayer Dungeon
item.description:
@Slayer_Dungeon wrote:

ok well im sorry to everone then I just thought because I know what its like maybe I could help some people but I see this topic was considered a joke to many. Im sorry again for wasting your time I was just trying to help, A mod can lock this topic since it seems useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Slayer Dungeon:

what is so funny about this topic? I wish I would have had someone to talk to at times so im trying to do that for others…

This is the wrong place to offer help for suicidal people.
If I wanted to kill myself do you really think I’d add you on msn and discuss my problems? NO.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

goatee:

?? Are you suggesting that in so inactive on these forums that I’ve had to, right now, go and read some of his past posts? Just because I don’t comment on everything he says or partake in discussion he was i doesn’t mean I didn’t read them. I know what he’s like to a limit, you just know a bit more. But I’ll tell you one thing for certain, nobody on this forum knew what he was like when he wasn’t on IRC, when he was at school or outside of the house. There could have been so many more reasons that none of us knew about for him to kill himself. So don’t act like you know him just becasue you have talked to him on the internet.

I didn’t say I knew him in that way, you’re saying you know him and you’re judging us for saying he would laugh at this topic, which he fucking would.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

?? Are you suggesting that I’m so inactive on these forums that I’ve had to, right now, go and read some of his past posts? Just because I don’t comment on everything he says or partake in discussions he was in doesn’t mean I didn’t read them. I know what he’s like to a limit, you just know a bit more. But I’ll tell you one thing for certain, nobody on this forum knew what he was like when he wasn’t on IRC, when he was at school or outside of the house. There could have been so many more reasons that none of us knew about for him to kill himself. So don’t act like you know him just because you have talked to him on the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:14, topic:209563”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=276035.msg2252963#msg2252963 date=1212269004]

I don’t really understand, people think he would be laughing at this but to be honest, he may have come across as a happy, funny guy online. But you can come across as anyone online. He was obviously so pissed off and unhappy with life that he killed himself and you’re all like “yeh he would be lolling at this lolz lolz lolz” Well maybe this thread is kind of lame because none of us knew him like a good friend but still.

If I’m wrong then sorry. But he was 14 and he killed himself, I don’t find it that hilarious.

Laughing at the thread, not sL. And quite frankly you didn’t speak to his as much as us so you don’t know what was lulz worthy in his mind.
[/quote]

Well I’m sorry but I have been on IRC and I have read his posts. So I kind of know the type of person he is (on the internet anyway).[/quote]

You’ve had a look at a few posts, you’ve been on IRC Once in a blue moon. Most of us are on IRC Every day, and usually sL was also. You don’t know what he’s like.

Read full topic

item.title: Im Here For You
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

jme:

You don’t know him too well. Right now he would be lol’ing in his grave @ this post.

I didn’t know Sl to well, but I was going to post exactly the same thing. A kid like him would be loling at this.
Like I and probably 90% of people who visit #mopar, its not a big “PLEASE SHOW SOME RESPECT” deal. All of us respect him, and I’m sure if there is some place he is at right now, dare I say it; Heaven, then I’m sure he knows that we respect him.
